title: We Will Be Stars
body:
[Am] She was just a [F] girl, she wanted to [C] fly [G] away
[Am] Love gave the [F] wings made out of [C] tears, and [G] SHAME

Love is a [Am] miracle, [F]  it's a [C] miracle maker [G]
She needed a [Am] miracle, [F] [C] something that could take her [G]

  Into the [F] stars
  Tonight in the [C] sky
  No one would [G] take away her [Am] pride
  She won't be [F] silent, silent [C] 
  She won't be [Am] silent, silent [G]

[Am] He was just a [F] boy, he wanted to [C] change his [G] star
[Am] Love gave him the [F] wings, he can [C] go high and [G] far

Love is a [Am] miracle, [F]  it's a [C] miracle maker [G]
We needed a [Am] miracle, [F] [C] something that could take [G] us

  Into the [F] stars

  No one would [G] take away our [Am] pride
  We won't be [F] silent, silent [C]

  We won't be [Am] silent, silent [G]

bodyLyrics:
She was just a girl, she wanted to fly away

Love is a miracle, it's a miracle maker 
She needed a miracle, something that could take her 

Into the stars
Tonight in the sky
No one would take away her pride
She won't be silent, silent 
She won't be silent, silent 

He was just a boy, he wanted to change his star
Love gave him the wings, he can go high and far

Love is a miracle, it's a miracle maker 
We needed a miracle, something that could take us

Into the stars
Tonight in the sky
No one would take away our pride
We won't be silent, silent 
We won't be silent, silent 

We will be stars tonight in the sky
No one will take away our pride
We won't be silent, silent 
We won't be silent, silent 

We will be stars tonight in the sky
No one will take away our pride
We won't be silent, silent 
We won't be silent, silent 

Above the skyline 
Into the open space
I see oblivion 
Signing the light rave

We will be stars tonight in the sky
No one will take away our pride
We won't be silent, silent 
We won't be silent, silent 

We will be stars tonight in the sky
No one will take away our pride
We won't be silent, silent 
We won't be silent, silent
